snippet: Lawmakers overwhelmingly approved the sending of reconnaissance planes, a frigate and midair fueling capacity to aid the campaign while refraining from direct attacks.
abstract: German Parliament votes 445-146 in support of providing more logistical support for campaign against Islamic State in Syria; vote, largely in response to request for help from France, does not allow German forces to be involved in direct combat.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers overwhelmingly approved the sending of reconnaissance planes, a frigate and midair fueling capacity to aid the campaign while refraining from direct attacks.

headline.main: German Parliament Votes to Send Military Assistance to Fight ISIS
headline.print_headline: German Parliament Votes to Increase Country’s Military Role Against ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
